Class FireEnemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
      • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
        • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Double
          • MovingImage
            • Enemy
              • FireEnemy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class FireEnemy
extends Enemy
    The FireEnemy class represents an Enemy with the Fireball projectile which the Player can defeat.
    Version:
    5.23.21
    Author:
    animan_patil
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • FireEnemy

        public FireEnemy(processing.core.PImage img,
                 int x,
                 int y)
        Creates a new instance of a FireEnemy object having its left corner at the inputed (x, y) coordinates.
        Parameters:
        img - The PImage which the FireEnemy will look like in the game (sprite).
        x - The X value of the FireEnemy's top left corner.
        y - The Y value of the FireEnemy's top left corner.
